documents.document: No objection certificate from the existing ‘Developer, filed through its authorized signatory, specifically designated for the purpose; as well as from the ‘land owner licensees’, in person (not through GPA/SPA assignees), to the proposed change/assignment.
A consent letter from the ‘new entity for the proposed change.

The status regarding the creation of third-party rights in the colony. In case no third-party rights are claimed to have been created in the colony, an affidavit to the said effect be also submitted by the existing developer.
Documents about the Technical and Financial Capacity of the ‘new entity’ proposed to be inducted as a ‘Developer’ or ‘shareholder(s)’ as per prescribed policy parameters for the grant of license.
An affidavit to pay the balance of administrative charges before final approval.
Details of the applied area where joint development and /or marketing rights are to be assigned
Proposed Shareholding Pattern of the developer company
Status of RERA registration of the project. If non-registered then an affidavit to this effect
Board resolution of authorized signatory of existing developer
Board resolution of authorized signatory of New entity
